column1: Current product url is not the canonical url!
column2: Current Product URL is not the Canonical URL!

column1: It seems that the current Category URLS has filters, the Alternate Hreflang Tags can not be placed on filtered URLS.
column2: It Seems that the current Category URLS has filters, Alternate Hreflang Tags can not be placed on filtered URLS.

column1: Set up your store front with the applicable language code and set them in the right group. More information about the setup and the way to group Storeviews can be found here.
column2: Set up your store front with the applicable language code and set them in the right group. More information about the setup and the way to group Storeviews can be found here.

column1: To debug simple add ?show-alternate=1 to the URL. Read this post when the HrefLang tags are not visible.
column2: To debug simple add ?show-alternate=1 to the URL. Read this post when the HrefLang tags are not visible.

column1: The HrefLang tag also can be used along with Canonical annotations. As the HrefLang tag needs a self-referential canonical URL we recommend to only show the Alternate HrefLang Tags on Canonical URLS.
column2: The HrefLang tag also can be used along with Canonical annotations. As the HrefLang tag needs a self-referential canonical URL we recommend to only show the Alternate HrefLang Tags on Canonical URLS.
